extendedInfo.description: Written by a bowling enthusiast, BowlingManager allows tracking of multiple bowlers & leagues, w/stats for bowler avg, series, high/low game & series.Only supports 3 game series for now.Future features to include: updated UI, frame by frame entry/tracking, handicaps, spare/strike counts, spare stats and much more!

reviews.comment: So if i bowl more than 3 games i need to add another series. What if i dont go by series? I just go til im tired.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It offers accurate stats- wish there was a way to view all scores at once, view total average for all bowling. Anxiously awaiting the updates!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Instead of down rating, try emailing dev if you have questions. I have found him to be very responsive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Really handy. Just wish you could backup the scores so I could update my phone :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: this app is great for keeping track, but it\'d be way better if it showed how you\'ve progressed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m just a casual bowler, but this totally does the trick. Only thing I could ask is flexibility in number of games played.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Like others have said, would prefer to key in scores.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If all you care about is tracking scores and average, this is a great app. Would be better if data would be graphed to show progress over time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect for keeping and tracking scores and averages of several people! We are casual bowlers, and this app is perfect for our needs Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best bowling stats apps out there that is free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Pretty awesome app, very convenient....just news a handicap adjuster for leagues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but could be better
reviews.comment: I love the app but it needs an exit button. I have to back out of several screens to exit.
reviews.author: Jamie Hightower

reviews.comment: Score input method could be a little easier. Always have to hit it twice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This would be a great app if you could change the number of games in a series.150 in game 4 = an average of 50
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app for tracking leagues. Looking forward to future releases...A KEEPER!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handicap
reviews.comment: I was just wondering when the handicap calculator was going to be added
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a nice idea but the interface could use some serious improvement. I have to pick the score twice every time before it adds it. Super lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app, but needs a back up option! If your phone ever screws up and you need a new one you loose all your bowling scores!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, frame by frame would be nice, key in scores rather than scroll, & different # of games series
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best bowling app ever. Cant believe its free.
reviews.author: A Google User
